channel.title: Balint Pekker | bpekker.dev
channel.description: A collection of 'pull-request' related posts | bPekker.dev

item.title: To Patch or Not To Patch
item.description: There is an ongoing debate among developers regarding the use of patches versus pull requests for contributions. Since its migration to GitLab in 2018, Drupal has undergone significant changes. As of July 2024, the removal of Drupal CI and automated patch testing could potentially change the way contributions are made.
